name: Training Dayz
description:
HOW TO PLAY TRAINING DAYZ:

  • Movement

Mouse to look around.

WASD keys to walk.

Left shift (hold) to run.

  • Weapon

Left click to shoot.

Right click (hold) to aim.

R key to reload.

T key to inspect weapon.

H key to holster, and H again to take out weapon.

Q/scrollwheel key to cycle equipped weapons.

  • Melee

F key to use knife attack.

  • Grenade

G key to throw a grenade.

  • Quality Settings:

P key to open quality settings menu.

  • Moving Worlds

You can move world by hiting 8 targets

every 5 moves there is a big world that going harder and harder.....

and after a while you go back to the start.

  • SAVE GAME

you can save your game by pressing Right Alt

and load it when you enter to the game
